QuestData.Title: The Tongue of Ba-Shon
QuestData.Description: Thank you for coming, $p. I am sorry to have been so cryptic, but I could not risk alerting the mogu to my work here.$B$BThey are seeking something in the valley. Plundering the tombs of their old kings for relics of power.$B$BI could not observe them long before having to flee, but I did manage to recover a relic of my own.$B$BThe Tongue of Ba-Shon will let us communicate securely over long distances, but only after I have bound it to myself.$B$BI think I'm ready to begin, if you are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Lorekeeper Cho in performing the Binding of Ba-Shon.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'll need to bind my essence to the Tongue, then you can use it to speak with me from anywhere.
QuestData.RewardText: This must be a very powerful relic for Zuan to want it back so badly.$b$bIt frightens me to think of what else they may find in the tombs...
